document.full_text: citigroup inc  declared its first dividend in more than two years on friday, announcing it will pay a penny per share on june 17, but analysts said the bank could take a while to pay the kinds of dividends that its rivals do.
document.title: citi reinstates quarterly dividend at 1 cent
lines_and_colors: citigroup inc  declared its first dividend in more than two years on friday, announcing it will pay a penny per share on june 17, but analysts said the bank could take a while to pay the kinds of dividends that its rivals do.
